Articles.Content: Hello. I am not usually the type to join forums, but this game is extremely fun and interesting. I've only scratched the surface of this game (My only successful satellite so far is literally useless), but experimenting is fun and there are so many things to try. I am currently working on accelerating up to light speed using only the infinite fuel debug option and simple parts with no mods. So far I am near 200,000,000 m/s without any troubles. I just wanted to see if it was even possible.
Nope, its practically impossible. Even with an insanely high twr, it would take literally years. And you would have to worry about the Kraken.
I like this concept of practically impossible.

Hm! So, will it just fall apart at a certain point? Do the physics just rip it to pieces eventually? If it keeps going as is it will reach the mark in 2 days or less, so I was getting pretty optimistic.
It has been completely successful. It took 5 days at full burn with the time at 4x.
